shortlyAfterYouE: ^Shortly after you enter the campus and set up inside your desk, a shining dark gray car pulls up in the front.
^CEO Ryan Flinn exits his car, an envelope tight in his grasp.
^"Ryan, I recently saw that the files were missing a project from last May. I was wondering what happened to project WERC?"
^"The WERC project was a mess, and the press had a field day with it."
^"I don't want that to define our work. I removed the files so the incident wasn't recreatable."
^"Are you working on anything in the realm?"
^"No, just checking the organization of the files."
^"If you do, you must inform me first."
^He starts to push through the big doors.
^As you begin walking away, you notice a paper, which seemed to have slipped out of the envelope because of it's small size.
^The paper reads: I know. Wire this account ten thousand a month, and maybe I won't leak this to the press.
